name: GitHub Universe San Francisco
description: GitHub Universe San Francisco is GitHubâ€™s flagship annual developer conference, bringing together software engineers, DevOps professionals, security experts, and technology leaders from around the world. The event focuses on modern software engineering practices, DevOps, cloud-native development, security, artificial intelligence, and open-source innovation. GitHub Universe features keynote announcements, technical sessions, hands-on workshops, and community networking, highlighting the future of software development on the GitHub platform.
